game.name: Cooking Super Girls
game.description:
Cooking Super Girls is an exclusively-designed free online cooking game for girls from different age groups. In this extremely popular dress up-cum-baking girls recreational activity, you have to take up the charge of helping girls to get prepared first before assisting them with cooking delicious cupcakes. These girls are passionate about both fashion and cooking, so you will surely have huge fun in this latest flash game.
 
Style up the manga girl and help her to attain the perfect look before giving her assistance in preparing the extremely yummy cupcakes. Once she carries a new and stylish outfit, it will take a few minutes to get her recipe prepared by following a few simple instructions. You are highly recommended to bring her superpowers into use to make her cake super delicious. This cute and colorful game is sure to have you double fun. 

Before you are going to bake your cupcakes, you need to take care of how to give your character a gorgeous and stylish look so that she can enjoy while cooking her recipe. This latest flash game is suitable for young girls. The entire gaming environment of this challenging and interesting cooking game is awesome. Apart from learning the latest fashion trends, you as a player will also get an opportunity to adopt the new and exciting ways on how to bake yummy cupcakes with the help of scrumptious and easily available toppings. One of the best both fashion and cooking games to play, Cooking Super Girls is an ultimate treat for all girls.
